QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: virtualCamJoystick
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: If this option is enabled the virtual cam joystick will be shown on the Fly view.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: virtualCamJoystickShowZoom
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Show virtual cam joystick zoom in/out
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: If enabled the zoom in/out virtual joystick will be shown on the Fly view.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: showFullScreenButton
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: If enabled the full screen button will be shown on the Fly view.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: localPositionRoll
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: This value specifies the default local position roll value.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: localPositionPitch
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: This value specifies the default local position pitch value.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: globalPositionElevation
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: This value specifies the default global position elevation value.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: globalPositionAzimuth
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: This value specifies the default global position azimuth value.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: camJoystickDZ
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: This value specifies the default camera joystick dead zone value.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: camJoystickGain
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: This value specifies the default camera joystick gain value.
